Package xyz.nardone.agenda_fps.applicazione

package xyz.nardone.agenda_fps.applicazione

  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    App
    JavaFX application entry point and scene manager.
    Appointment
    Client-facing appointment DTO used by the JavaFX app.
    AppointmentIds
    Appointment DTO with banker and client IDs for API calls.
    AppointmentSharedId
    Singleton holder for the currently selected appointment ID.
    AppointmentsStatistics
    Appointment statistics DTO used by the JavaFX application.
    Banker
    Banker DTO used by the JavaFX application.
    BankerList
    Banker list item used for table views.
    BankerSharedId
    Singleton holder for the currently selected banker ID.
    BankerSharedIdAndDates
    Singleton holder for the selected banker ID and date range.
    BankerStatistics
    Banker statistics DTO used by the JavaFX application.
    Callback
    Callback DTO used by the JavaFX application.
    CallbackIds
    Callback DTO with banker and client IDs for API calls.
    CallbackList
    Callback list item used for table views.
    CallbackSharedId
    Singleton holder for the currently selected callback ID.
    Client
    Client DTO used by the JavaFX application.
    ClientIds
    Client DTO with banker ID for API calls.
    ClientList
    Client list item used for table views.
    ClientSharedId
    Singleton holder for the currently selected client ID.
    ConnectionRequest<T>
    Simple HTTP client wrapper used by the JavaFX application.
    DynamicPortQuery
    Utility for discovering the service port by probing the /port endpoint.
    Esito
    Esito DTO used by the JavaFX application.
    EsitoSharedId
    Singleton holder for the currently selected esito ID.
    PageSharedId
    Singleton holder for the active navigation page ID.
    Polizza
    Polizza DTO used by the JavaFX application.
    PolizzaSharedId
    Singleton holder for the currently selected polizza ID.
    Response
    Simple API response wrapper used by the JavaFX client.
    ServerPort
    Singleton holder for the service port discovered at runtime.
